programme.title: Pain Of The Fatherless
programme.desc: After Echezona has spent 15 years without a child he gets his maid pregnant. Now he believes as soon as he reunites with his son, all the problems will be over.

programme.title: After 1970
programme.desc: Metu as the wife to a prince is the solution to the quest of the Amankweke royal family, but the wives, Queen Margaret and Scholastica will do everything to make this fail.

programme.title: The Obdurate
programme.desc: Ijeoma is refuses all the rich suitors that comes for her hand in marriage, because her sisters manipulate her out of jealousy. Now she has placed a curse on them never to be happy.

programme.title: Plague Of Royalty
programme.desc: Prince Okute, a wayward prince who will run after everything under a skirt falls in love with the only woman his father the king finds love in, but who is ready to sacrifice.

programme.title: When Fools Fight
programme.desc: Zik arrives in the village and show affection to all the women, including Agnes, whom everyone believes could never find a man.

programme.title: Mummy Must Obey
programme.desc: Oji-Ugo suffers a great deal from her son Aluka because of her wayward lifestyle. Would she allow it to continue?

programme.title: My Local Wife
programme.desc: Okwuchi marries Arinze, but she struggles to adapt to her new life, holding onto her old ways. Frustrated by the lack of change, Arinze sought comfort with Sofia.

programme.title: Crazy Big Sis
programme.desc: Ikennas sister brings Nwakaego from the village for Ikenna to marry, but she will get pregnant for Linus the gate man and ruin Adas plan.

programme.title: Home On Fire
programme.desc: Believing Eunice has been unfaithful and mothered another mans child, Mark retaliates by cheating on her. Now, the truth is emerging.

programme.title: Intelligent Nurses
programme.desc: Bridget boasts to all the villagers about her brilliant daughter, nurse Lizzy. However, the truth is revealed when Jude discovers Lizzys deceitful ways.

programme.title: A Mothers Love
programme.desc: Caro is in an abusive relationship with Tompolo and refuse to leave the marriage. All hell broke loose when Tompolo attempts to sell their only daughter.

programme.title: Oracle Of Justice
programme.desc: A late kings allegiance to a forbidden brotherhood clashes with the kingdoms traditions. With his soul restless, they face off against the palace to claim the kings heart.

programme.title: Money Must Be Buried
programme.desc: Osinachi is killed because her boyfriend trusted his uncle, now the dead has spoken for revenge and everyone involved must pay.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Chetanna encounters a forest being. Mkpulumma fortifies her girls. A wandering son returns home.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye returns to a Mgberi where no one knows Nnanna. Obiajulu is handed a heavy task. Urenna falls deeper for Nnanna.

programme.title: Boss Baby
programme.desc: Mary orchestrated a deceitful plot by planting a grown baby in her best friends life and family, aiming to ruin her marriage. However, the scheme is thwarted.

programme.title: Undiluted Ladies
programme.desc: Chief Zack faces trouble when two determined women try to secure a contract from him by any means. However, Chief and Cindy are about to turn the tables in an unexpected twist.

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: Things go sour in life of a couple when a vindictive ex-girlfriend shows up with vengeance, with the help of her brother.

programme.title: Buried Empathy
programme.desc: Prosper and Onyeka Will do anything to make wealth, including sacrificing their father and only sister. Everything would have been fine, but Alakirija the herbalist played them all along.

programme.title: Justice And Innocence
programme.desc: Few years ago, Mercy live a very reckless life and steps on the wrong toes. This action triggers a man and he cursed her. She has to find him and asks for forgiveness.

programme.title: Mad Combo
programme.desc: A struggling driver, disrespected at home, faces his greatest test when his boss makes unexpected advances. Will he resist, or cross the line?

programme.title: Woman Of Justice
programme.desc: Agunze was banished from his fathers land and after he lost every member of his family. The villagers and the elders in council are convinced that he has a hand in their death.

programme.title: A Strong Decision
programme.desc: After several disappointments, Obinna finally finds a rich lady who believes in his dreams and ready to sponsor him, but things takes a different turn and everything changes.

programme.title: Weeping On The Throne
programme.desc: A queen kills Jidennas mother, tries to kill Jidenna to make sure that her son becomes the next king. After some years, Jidenna finds his way back to the palace.

programme.title: Game Of Fate
programme.desc: Elena is a workaholic with zero social life and her mother plays a game of fate at a club on her behalf and wins her a date with Danie. He is bent on making her lose everything.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Mausi gives Peace a wake-up call about her new status. Folake finds out some shocking news.

programme.title: Ring Of Lies
programme.desc: Thando, wounded after being thrown out by Vusi and Sli, goes on the campaign against Ruth.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Ogechi and Susan fight each other they realize they are dating the same man.

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: Sbu declares his love for Thandeka. Will both families support the young couple? Mpiyakhe sends the incoming chief a gift and Iris battles to keep her secrets under wraps.

programme.title: The Johnsons
programme.desc: A family sitcom that focus on an average family based in Lagos Nigeria, their diverse traits and how they cope with what life has to offer them

programme.title: Greed And Desire
programme.desc: Morakile pleads for his life. Atleha gets the lobola money, but has other intentions for the money. Thlabi lets Thakani in on Bonngoes dying wish. Nqobile gets a strange call from Morakile.

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: Ademide is given a difficult assignment. The Gyados tell the police about Atinuke. Jeff asks Tivdoo for a favour.

programme.title: Brethren
programme.desc: Tobi has an ominous experience with AK. Ronke Adio makes a surprising confession regarding her husbands death. Chief realizes how much of an unexpected hold Dag has on him.

programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.desc: The secret affair between two lovers is exposed when the ladys colleague sends a picture of the couple making out to the blogs.

programme.title: American Boy

programme.title: Rule Number 1
